reward_body:
Is it how all the things begin with in a friends circle not knowing each other’s
then we all started talking
spending time together,
you said you literally hatted me at the beginning
And then you fallen for me as well
you know what sometimes I wonder where did it all begins
maybe it doesn’t matter
But I just want to take you through the journey
so yeah, see you at next chapter

I remember the day we talked about manakin birds
we discussed what if we follow their strategy
just imagine
njn peenukananu verumbo nee avide attitude ittu irikum
And I had to dance to impress you athum tough steps
super ayyaaaane athu
You know what you would still fallen for me even if we were manakins
ntellu oru tough stepum 4 vari paatum ndu
See you on the next chapter

This is something that I would never forget about us
njn thoufeeq Niranjan ml mariya nee
the first rain walk we had together
I had only one thing in my mind at that time
ngee ivalkku sherikum pranthaano...
but when I think of that now knowing more about you
I could feel the little girl inside you who always
wanted to be happy for littile things in her life
This could be point were I started falling for u I don’t know I assume
So yeah let see what’s in the next chapter

Haa this one
placement nu vendi fill cheythaa excel file labinnu noki
ninte birthday eduthaarnnu
and you know what I literally remembered it until march 22
athey ithine kurichu kooduthal chodiyam onnu vendaaata
thane appo istam onnum allaarnnu enik kandoorarnnu
Chumma oru surprise kodukkaa vechu
nee ente birthday ummante status kandathorkundo
Athinu pakaram veeta vechu
pine allaandu thante birthday orthirikande avishyam onnillaa
what could be the next chapter any guess

thaanu ee sthalam orkundo
we talked a lot on that day
thaaanu nthonda sister avanu povaarnne ennu paranu
Pashune kurichu samsarichu
angane kore samsarichu annu
thaanu sister avanu povaarnne nthaa ariyo
first and most important thane kondu kootiyaa koodillaa
pinne chellapo karthavu vichaarichu kanum
malappurathu oru super payyan indu ivalle avanu kodukam ennu
Pakshe ndaalo at this point cusat kore okke theernaarnu
oru pravishyam koode, koode padikaanu patteernne
njn nine campusil ninnu thane premicheernne
Aduthe nthaanu ariyo merinne

No we didn’t hugged on that day
I remember I said you sorry because I take your waist line
all I wanted to make sure that you don’t slip away from me
because we went so far and I was afraid too
that’s the first time I went so far into the sea
you said this is the best moment of your life with me
ayyo athu engane paranathu ennu enik ippozhum ormandu
haa pinne nee annu choicheele nte best moment ethaaanu aa
athu annu kadalilu athre poyille athaanu, enne athra dooram arum kondu poyitilla
Aaa appo athre olloo poyi kedannu orengu
nte ponno romantic aarnu athu
But you know if we got one more chance to go that far
I would hug you, feel your lips, feel your breath
and let you know that I am here we can go little deeper
So yeah catch you on next chapter

kayinna ithraaa olloo merinne nammalle cusat moments
atho enik orthu edukaanu pataanittaano
ithu orkundo merine
thaanu house vacate cheythu povumbo raavile ninnem mlneem
drop cheythe nte phonil ndaarnna 2 rupa note thaanu thirichu thennappo
vedikaanu thoneela
vecho adutha pravishyam kandaaalu thenna mathi ennu njn parane
I thought this would be the end
orikallum vichaarichillaaa that we will met each other againnu
nthinaa merinne nammalu veendum kandu muttiye
I don’t know lets figure out why and what heppened next!

We could have ended up in different cities
nthinu different countries itself
Why did we end up together
we started talking too much
we started going out without our friends
we spend so much time together
Appoyum areelaarnnu merinne we would reach at
a point where I completely fallen for you
Vere oru vektheene ithreem snehikaanu pattunna
ayale kurichu ithreem concerned aaavunna
Oru stage lifeillu verum ennu enik appo areellaarnnu
Pinne nthoke ndaaye merinne
see you on next chapter

Njn adhyam aayitu football match stadiumthillu kanunne
Puthuvyppu beach
Then I remember we used plan weekends going home and returning together
Nammallu spend cheytha kooduthalu time railwastationllum trainillum aaanu
Comedy …
merinne you deserve to be happy
nthinaa nte kutti inagnathe oru situation choose cheythe

Then I remember the day we both confess each other
My last days in litmus7
from that day to until now
What I feel for you has only started to grow
Yeah chellappo nannaayittu miss cheyyum
The urge to hug you kiss you and let you know
That you matters
Enthoke parayanu indu thonnum pakshe nthaa parayanulle areela
merinne bhaaki katha thaaanu para
just 10 more days
I believe you
